issue.title: div() for unsigned integral types

discussion.p: There is no div() function for unsigned integer types.
There are several possible resolutions. The simplest one is noted below. Other possibilities include a templated solution.

issue.rationale: Toronto: C99 does not have these unsigned versions because the signed version exist just to define the implementation-defined behavior of signed integer division. Unsigned integer division has no implementation-defined behavior and thus does not need this treatment.
